correctness.description: Accuracy of the final output relative to the expected result.

efficiency.description: How efficiently the task was performed in terms of computational resources and time.

error_handling.description: Ability to handle errors or unexpected input during execution.

reasoning_traceability.description: Clarity and availability of the reasoning trace or steps taken to reach the final output.

problem_solving_steps.description: Number of steps executed correctly in problem-solving process.

data_contamination.description: Prevention of data contamination from the internet or other external sources.

execution.description: Successful execution of the code or script without crashes or infinite loops.

communication.description: Effectiveness of communication between agents or system components.

user_feedback.description: Quality of feedback given to the user during execution.

compliance_with_procedure.description: Adherence to the predefined plan or procedure provided for the agents.

request_satisfaction.description: The degree to which the initial request was satisfied.
